entities.name: hospital
entities.description: The hospital is mentioned as a convenient place for the students to meet their mother. (Excerpt: 'convenient for the hospital than the Burrow')

entities.name: burrow
entities.description: The Burrow is mentioned as an alternative location, but not convenient for the hospital. (Excerpt: 'convenient for the hospital than the Burrow')

entities.name: floo powder
entities.description: Floo powder is a magical object that allows for transportation, but not safe to use at the moment. (Excerpt: 'How’re we going? asked Fred, looking shaken. “Floo powder?”')

entities.name: portkey
entities.description: A Portkey is a magical object that will be used for transportation instead of Floo powder. (Excerpt: 'You will be taking a Portkey.')

entities.name: phineas nigellus
entities.description: Phineas Nigellus is a wizard who needs to report back before the students can leave. (Excerpt: 'I wish to be sure that the coast is clear before sending you — Phineas Nigellus to report back')

entities.name: fawkes
entities.description: Fawkes is a magical creature who sends a warning signal by leaving a golden feather. (Excerpt: 'It is Fawkes’s warning, said Dumbledore')

entities.name: minerva mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is a person who goes to head off someone. (Excerpt: 'Minerva, go and head her off — tell her any story')

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is the main character who is giving instructions to the students. (Throughout the text)
